title: Widow

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - At night, choose a player to Listen to. You hear everything that happens to them, learning their external notifications (ex: roleblocked, controlled, attacked). If they die, you learn their cause of death, even if they're cleaned.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If the player you listened to is visited by no one but you, it's quiet enough that you can hear their breath, and you'll learn who they visit.
- If your target is attacked and protected, you learned the role of the attacker and the defender.
- You learn if the player is under any status effects, including frames.
- You are not affected by frames.

fields.name: Background:
fields.value: - At night, you may Overhear a player, learning their external notifications. You do not learn their status effects, and you do not learn anything related to being attacked.
